article_title: Obamacare Ruined My Healthcare Coverage, And Now I'm Just Another Statistic

article_metadata.description: BY PHILIP DORSEY - Running from Obamacare was like running from a long driving rain in a wilderness; sooner or later I, and every place I might reasonably try to take shelter from it, would be soaked.
article_metadata.author: Capital Flows
